enWisdom: Planning is half of the assistance
Planning before action saves one from regret
Planning before action saves one from error

Wisdom: الْقَلِيلُ مَعَ التَّدْبِيرِ أَبْقَى مِنَ الْكَثِيرِ مَعَ التَّبْذِيرِ
enWisdom: Little [done] with planning is more lasting than a lot done with wastefulness

Wisdom: أَدَلُّ شَيْ‏ءٍ عَلَى غَزَارَةِ الْعَقْلِ حُسْنُ التَّدْبِيرِ
enWisdom: The most manifest sign of abundant intelligence is good planning

Wisdom: حُسْنُ التَّدْبِيرِ يُنْمِي قَلِيلَ الْمَالِ وَسُوءُ التَّدْبِيرِ يُفْنِي كَثِيرَهُ
enWisdom: Good planning makes little wealth grow while bad planning causes abundant wealth to perish
Management [and planning] makes life good
Lengthy contemplation improves the outcomes of planning

Wisdom: قِوَامُ الْعَيْشِ حُسْنُ التَّقْدِيرِ وَمِلَاكُهُ حُسْنُ التَّدْبِيرِ
enWisdom: The mainstay of life is good estimation and its basis is good management
There is no wisdom like planning
There is no poverty with good management
The bane of livelihood is mismanagement
The cause of ruin is bad planning
The cause of ruin is bad planning
Bad planning is the key to poverty
One whose planning is bad, his ruin in hastened
One whose planning is delayed, his destruction is expedited
One whose panning is bad, his estimation is nullified

Wisdom: مَنْ سَاءَ تَدْبِيرُهُ كَانَ هَلَاكُهُ فِي تَدْبِيرِهِ
enWisdom: One whose planning is bad, his destruction is in his planning
No affluence [can be acquired] with mismanagement

Wisdom: يُسْتَدَلُّ عَلَى الْإِدْبَارِ بِأَرْبَعٍ سُوءِ التَّدْبِيرِ وَقُبْحِ التَّبْذِيرِ وَقِلَّةِ الِاعْتِبَارِ وَكَثْرَةِ الِاعْتِذَارِ
enWisdom: Turning backward is evinced by four things: bad planning, foul extravagance, lack of consideration and too many excuses
